Locale.Value:
- Added custom backup path settings, now you can specify the storage location of backup files
- When multiple documents are selected in the directory tree on the left, the writing targets of the documents can be set in batches
- Other detailed adjustments and experience improvements

- 增加自定义备份路径的设置，现在你可以指定备份文件的存储位置了
- 在左侧目录树中选中多个文档时，可以批量设置文档的写作目标
- 其他细节调整以及体验提升
